title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with a mix of fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for a sweet treat.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
summary: Succulent shrimp cooked in a zesty lemon garlic sauce, perfect over pasta or rice.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries for a delightful breakfast.
